description: Test file for reasoning_content generation in the Agno framework, verifying proper population of reasoning_content in RunResponse during streaming and non-streaming modes.

methods.name: test_reasoning_content_from_reasoning_tools
methods.description: Tests that reasoning_content is populated in non-streaming mode.

methods.name: test_reasoning_content_from_reasoning_tools_streaming
methods.description: Tests that reasoning_content is populated in streaming mode.
